chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Human Heart
chapters.info: Meri do Ahlan a'Conlin, p. 79—Murandian noble, allegedly a direct descendent of Katrine a'Coralle, the first Queen of Murandy. She was the first woman at Moiraine's table for registry for the bounty. She is plump, and has a one-week-old son, Sedrin. See also a'Conlin, Sedrin.
